title: Can we give improvement exams in cbse anytime? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A, See,every thing is same as regular mode exam but the difference is earlieryour school was submitting your board exam forms ,now you will do it by yourself and will be shown as private candidate.To appear in cbse improvement exam you should have to fill improvement form which can be obtained from your regional cbse office. After filling the form,you will have to wait for a year(which is like preparation period for exam) and in march you will receive your admit card at your mentioned address,(in case you didn't get it by post in reasonable time say before 2 weeks of exam you should visit cbse office along with your acknowledgment receipt.) you will be allotted with a center school where your will give your exam same as regular student and your result will also be declared on the same date as of regular so there is nothing like you can give improvement at anytime.
For improvement examination only one chance in the succeeding year is permitted, and for the additional subject, the candidate may appear within 6 years of passing the Main examination.
